citations.narrative:
Upon arrival to the facility, it was noted that the farm buildings were empty and no animals were present on the property.
The home was also empty. In speaking with an individual working on the home, he indicated that he did not know when
the owners left the property. The Aphis official contacted the licensee via phone call and left a message. The licensees
failed to notify Animal Care of a change of address no fewer than 90 days nor did they obtain a new license before this
change of location.
A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before any change in the name,
address, management, substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations, activities, and number or
type of animals described in paragraph (b)(2) of this section. Any person who is subject to the regulations and who
intends to exhibit any animal at any location other than the person’s approved site must provide that information on their
application form in accordance with paragraph (a) of this section and submit written itineraries in accordance with § 2.126.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: FROM THIS DAY (3-14-23) FORWARD.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee via voicemail.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
Upon arrival to the facility, it was noted that the farm buildings were empty and no animals were present on the property.  
The home was also empty.  In speaking with an individual working on the home, he indicated that he did not know when 
the owners left the property. The Aphis official contacted the licensee via phone call and left a message.  The licensees 
failed to notify Animal Care of a change of address no fewer than 90 days nor did they obtain a new license before this 
change of location.  
A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before any change in the name, 
address, management, substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations, activities, and number or 
type of animals described in paragraph (b)(2) of this section. Any person who is subject to the regulations and who 
intends to exhibit any animal at any location other than the person’s approved site must provide that information on their 
application form in accordance with paragraph (a) of this section and submit written itineraries in accordance with § 2.126. 
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY:  FROM THIS DAY (3-14-23) FORWARD. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee via voicemail.

End Section
